job_description: Senior IT Business Analyst | Pharma - job post Infoway solutions LLC South San Francisco, CA 94080 • Hybrid remote $55 - $60 an hour -  Part-time Responded to 51-74% of applications in the past 30 days, typically within 5 days. Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $55 - $60 an hour Job Type Part-time Overview: The IT Business Systems Analyst will be responsible for working closely with partners with Business and IT groups. The IT Business Systems Analyst will be supporting projects in the Market Excellence product line. Responsibilities: ● Drive the project from initiation to completion end-to-end as a BSA. ● Manage scope timelines and coordinate project activities. Facilitate workshops - story-boarding workshops, translate story-boarding artifacts into an electronic format and provide input in design sessions. ● Contribute in roadmap discussions and vendor assessments. Clear communication keeping IT and the customer apprised of developments and requirements, key metrics. ● Must build strong relationships with our customers. Analyze and document current and future business process models. ● Analyze and document requirements (scope), business rules (use cases). Analyze and document data requirements (from business needs perspective). ● Collaborate with Customers, IT Scrum Masters, Architects, Developers & Software Quality Assurance on solutions and risks. ● Plan user acceptance tests (UAT), create UAT scripts and facilitate UAT. Coordinate with implementation team to provide clarifications and support UAT/business demo ● Perform knowledge transfer to training and communication teams. Support user deployment activities as needed. Lead stakeholders thru the business analysis lifecycle ● Setup internal review sessions between technical team and UX team to review mockups. Work with the Data Lake team to understand data to draft rules for calculation. ● Create business rule documents for KPIs ● Create functional/non-functional requirement documentation for dashboards ● Maintain requirements by sprint and manage in JIRA ● Update backlogs based on feedbacks Education Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, Systems Design, or equivalent field Job Type: Part-time Pay: $55.00 - $60.00 per hour Ability to commute/relocate: South San Francisco, CA 94080: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Experience: SQL: 1 year (Preferred) Pharmacy sales: 4 years (Required) Business Systems Analyst: 8 years (Required) UAT: 1 year (Preferred) JIRA: 1 year (Preferred) Work Location: Hybrid remote in South San Francisco, CA 94080 If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
